item.title: Fight Chain
item.description: The Idea It’s been ages since I’ve posted something. One of my hobbies is to watch Mixed Martial Arts, and the question often comes up that if fighter X beats fighter Y, and fighter Y beats fighter Z, could fighter X beat fighter Y? An example of this is an upcoming fight in October, Khamzat Chimaev v Robert Whittaker. Chimaev has beaten Gilbert Burns, who has beaten Stephen Thompson, who has beaten Robert Whittaker.
